questions.questionText: If you could choose the location for your dream home, where would it be?
What interior design color theme would you prefer for your dream home?

options.optionText: choose your color theme in the color wheel

questions.questionText: What personal life features would be essential in your dream home?

options.optionText: Huge bookshelf with a cozy reading nook

questions.questionText: How important is having a dedicated home office or workspace to you?
If you could invite someone to your dream accommodation for a special room tour, who would it be?

options.optionText: A close friend or family member
A total stranger for a surprise

questions.questionText: If you could invite anyone, living or dead, for the special room tour, who would it be? (Only if you chose stranger in the previous question)

options.optionText: A historical figure for intriguing conversations
A celebrity for a touch of glamour and excitement
A fictional character for a unique and imaginative experience
